scripts.build: jade view --obj data.json -o www; browserify -v -t babelify lib/index -o www/js/index.js; stylus -u nib -u griddy style/index.styl -o www/css/styles.css
scripts.watch: jade view --obj data.json  -o www -w | watchify -v -t babelify lib/index.js -o www/js/index.js | stylus -u nib -u griddy style/index.styl -w -o www/css/styles.css
scripts.dev: livereload www | http-server www -p ${PORT:-3000} | npm run watch
